title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: As the stairway turns a railing begins on the outside edge.  Formed from bones fused together the railing provides a much needed aid in the sharp curve.  Strands of spidersilk attached to the railing float in the breeze, dew drips from them, reflecting brightly in the moonlight.
